languages.text: Идеалы, которым следовал{mf||а} {name} фон Валанциус, были чужды нравам Империума, но близки сердцам многих. Каждый в Просторе, кто не мог достичь мира в споре, кто был обделен справедливостью, устремлялся во дворец Вольного Торговца в поисках милости.

The ideals that {name} von Valancius was committed to were alien to the Imperium but close to the hearts of many in the Expanse. Anyone who could not resolve a dispute or who was denied justice rushed to the palace of the Rogue Trader in search of mercy.
languages.original_text: Идеалы, которым следовал{mf||а} {name} фон Валанциус, были чужды нравам Империума, но близки сердцам многих. Каждый в Просторе, кто не мог достичь мира в споре, кто был обделен справедливостью, устремлялся во дворец Вольного Торговца в поисках милости.

traits.locale_text: Ideals that {name} von Valancius was committed to, were alien to the Imperium's way of life but were close to the hearts of many in the Expanse. Everyone who couldn't find peace in a dispute, who was denied justness, rushed to the palace of the Rogue Trader in search of mercy.

Ideals that {name} von Valancius was committed to, were alien to the Imperium's way of life but were close to the hearts of many in the Expanse. Everyone who couldn't find peace in a dispute, who was denied justness, rushed to the palace of the Rogue Trader in search of mercy.

The ideals that {name} von Valancius was committed to were alien to the Imperium but close to the hearts of many in the Expanse. Anyone who couldn't resolve a dispute or who was denied justice rushed to the palace of the Rogue Trader in search of mercy.

The ideals that {name} von Valancius was committed to were alien to the Imperium but close to the hearts of many in the Expanse. Anyone who couldn't resolve a dispute or who was denied justice rushed to the palace of the Rogue Trader in search of mercy.

The ideals that {name} von Valancius was committed to were alien to the Imperium but close to the hearts of many in the Expanse. Anyone who could not resolve a dispute or who was denied justice rushed to the palace of the Rogue Trader in search of mercy.

The ideals that {name} von Valancius was committed to were alien to the Imperium but close to the hearts of many in the Expanse. Anyone who could not resolve a dispute or who was denied justice rushed to the palace of the Rogue Trader in search of mercy.

languages.text: {name}·冯·瓦兰修斯想要致力实现的理想与帝国格格不入，但却与扩区内许多人的心息息相关。所有无法解决争端，或无法寻得正义的人，都会涌向行商浪人的宫殿，寻求仁慈的裁决。
languages.original_text: The ideals that {name} von Valancius was committed to were alien to the Imperium but close to the hearts of many in the Expanse. Anyone who could not resolve a dispute or who was denied justice rushed to the palace of the Rogue Trader in search of mercy.

traits.locale_text: {name}·冯·瓦兰修斯想要致力实现的理想与帝国格格不入，但却与扩区内许多人的心息息相关。所有无法解决争端，或无法寻得正义的人，都会涌向行商浪人的宫殿，寻求仁慈的裁决。

languages.text: Die Ideale, denen {name} von Valancius sich verschrieben hatte, waren dem Imperium fremd, lagen aber vielen in der Ausdehnung am Herzen. Jeder, der einen Disput nicht beilegen konnte oder dem Gerechtigkeit verwehrt geblieben war, eilte zum Palast {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin}, um Gnade zu erbitten.
languages.original_text: The ideals that {name} von Valancius was committed to were alien to the Imperium but close to the hearts of many in the Expanse. Anyone who could not resolve a dispute or who was denied justice rushed to the palace of the Rogue Trader in search of mercy.

traits.locale_text: Die Ideale, denen {name} von Valancius sich verschrieben hatte, waren dem Imperium fremd, lagen aber vielen in der Ausdehnung am Herzen. Jeder, der einen Disput nicht beilegen konnte oder dem Gerechtigkeit verwehrt geblieben war, eilte zum Palast {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin}, um Gnade zu erbitten.

languages.text: Les idéaux que {name} von Valancius avait embrassés étaient étrangers à l'Imperium, mais comptaient beaucoup pour de nombreux habitants des Étendues. Quiconque ne pouvait résoudre un différend ou était victime d'iniquité se précipitait au palais {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande} en quête de justice.
languages.original_text: The ideals that {name} von Valancius was committed to were alien to the Imperium but close to the hearts of many in the Expanse. Anyone who could not resolve a dispute or who was denied justice rushed to the palace of the Rogue Trader in search of mercy.

traits.locale_text: Les idéaux que {name} von Valancius avait embrassés étaient étrangers à l'Imperium, mais comptaient beaucoup pour de nombreux habitants des Étendues. Quiconque ne pouvait résoudre un différend ou était victime d'iniquité se précipitait au palais {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande} en quête de justice.

languages.text: Los ideales a los que se dedicaba {name} von Valancius eran ajenos al Imperium, pero muy importantes para muchos habitantes de la Extensión. Quien no era capaz de resolver una disputa o de conseguir justicia viajaba al palacio de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente en busca de piedad.
languages.original_text: The ideals that {name} von Valancius was committed to were alien to the Imperium but close to the hearts of many in the Expanse. Anyone who could not resolve a dispute or who was denied justice rushed to the palace of the Rogue Trader in search of mercy.

traits.locale_text: Los ideales a los que se dedicaba {name} von Valancius eran ajenos al Imperium, pero muy importantes para muchos habitantes de la Extensión. Quien no era capaz de resolver una disputa o de conseguir justicia viajaba al palacio de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente en busca de piedad.

languages.text: {name}・フォン・ヴァランシウスが掲げていた理想は、帝国にとっては異質なものであったが、エクスパンスの多くの人々にとっては身近なものだった。紛争を解決できない者や正義を否定された者は、慈悲を求めて自由開拓者の宮殿に殺到した。
languages.original_text: The ideals that {name} von Valancius was committed to were alien to the Imperium but close to the hearts of many in the Expanse. Anyone who could not resolve a dispute or who was denied justice rushed to the palace of the Rogue Trader in search of mercy.

traits.locale_text: {name}・フォン・ヴァランシウスが掲げていた理想は、帝国にとっては異質なものであったが、エクスパンスの多くの人々にとっては身近なものだった。紛争を解決できない者や正義を否定された者は、慈悲を求めて自由開拓者の宮殿に殺到した。

languages.text: {name} von Valancius'un öne attığı fikirler, İmparatorluk'a fazlasıyla yabancı olsa da Enginlik'teki birçoklarının kalbine dokunmayı başardı. Anlaşmazlıklarını çözemeyen veya adaletsizlikten mağdur olan herkes, merhamet arayışında Hür Tacir'in sarayına akın etti.
languages.original_text: The ideals that {name} von Valancius was committed to were alien to the Imperium but close to the hearts of many in the Expanse. Anyone who could not resolve a dispute or who was denied justice rushed to the palace of the Rogue Trader in search of mercy.

traits.locale_text: {name} von Valancius tarafından öne atılan fikirler, İmparatorluk için fazlasıyla yabancıydı ancak Enginlik'teki birçoklarının kalbine dokunmayı başardı. Bir anlaşmazlığı çözemeyen veya adaletsizliğe maruz kalan herkes, merhamet arayışında Hür Tacir'in sarayına akın etti.
